Created attachment 505035
win 7 gadget

Build ID: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9 ID:20110110191547

After FF restart, the FF window is in focus, but the Win7 gadgets are displayed on top of the browser.

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Activate some Win7 gadgets.
2.Start FF and install an add-on (or do any activity that will require to restart FF).
3.Restart FF.

Actual Results:
The FF window is in focus, but the Win7 gadgets are displayed on top of the browser.

Expected Results:
FF should restart with no rendering issues.
